snippet: José Leonídio Rosendo dos Santos has been diving into the polluted Tietê and Pinheiros rivers for more than 20 years, bringing to the surface a list of items that is eerie and bizarre.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Jose Leonidio Rosendo dos Santos, who for over 20 years has been diving and scouring the murky depths of polluted Tiete and Pinheiros rivers in Brazil, bringing to the surface a list of items that is eerie and bizarre.
lead_paragraph: José Leonídio Rosendo dos Santos has been diving into the polluted Tietê and Pinheiros rivers for more than 20 years, bringing to the surface a list of items that is eerie and bizarre.

headline.seo: A Diver Sifts Through São Paulo’s Polluted Rivers
headline.main: A Willing Explorer of São Paulo’s Polluted Rivers
headline.print_headline: A Willing Explorer of São Paulo’s Polluted Rivers
